muxi.payservices.sdk.service

Class MPSManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • muxi.payservices.sdk.service.MPSManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMPSManager

    public class MPSManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements IMPSManager
    The class that implements IMPSManager interface. It's used to control service connection, call service methods and set callback's answers.
    See Also:
    IMPSManager, MPSManagerCallback, CallbackAnswer

      • initialize

        public void initialize(boolean showMessage,
                       java.lang.String merchantId,
                       java.lang.String token)
        Description copied from interface: IMPSManager
        Initialize muxiPAY services application. This is the first step to be able to transact.
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface IMPSManager
        Parameters:
        showMessage - Used to define if the PINPad should display messages or not. For example: INSERT CARD and REMOVE CARD messages
        merchantId - the merchantId of the establishment
        token - integration token sent by Muxi used to validate user

      • deconfigure

        public void deconfigure(boolean isToIgnorePendingTransaction)
        Description copied from interface: IMPSManager
        Deconfigure muxiPAY services application. This is used to clean an application data, leading to the initial state after installation. After this call, the application must be initialized again in order to be able to transact.
        Specified by:
        deconfigure in interface IMPSManager
        Parameters:
        isToIgnorePendingTransaction - - parameter that indicate whether to ignore pending transactions true: deconfigures even if there are pending transactions false: only deconfigures if there are no pendings transactions

      • transaction

        public void transaction(MPSTransaction transaction)
        Description copied from interface: IMPSManager
        Make a payment using muxiPAY services. It's used to start a communication process with PINPAD to capture data from card and perform a standard EMV transaction.
        Specified by:
        transaction in interface IMPSManager
        Parameters:
        transaction - Object containing the transaction data
        See Also:
        MPSTransaction

      • cancelTransaction

        public void cancelTransaction(MPSTransaction transaction)
        Description copied from interface: IMPSManager
        Cancel any transaction using muxiPAY services. It's used to start a communication process with PINPAD to capture data from card and perform a standard EMV transaction. To cancel the last transaction of a given Transaction Mode(CREDIT, DEBIT, VOUCHER), use a MPSTransaction object setting only MPSTransaction.TransactionMode
        Specified by:
        cancelTransaction in interface IMPSManager
        Parameters:
        transaction - Object containing the transaction data
        See Also:
        MPSTransaction
